name: Easy CSV Importer BETA
author: WebTechGlobal

sections.description: Easy and advanced CSV importer for WordPress. Easy CSV Importer will auto-blog and create categories. Premium edition updates posts, text spins and more.
sections.installation:
Initial upload and activation as guided by WordPress.org standard plugin installation.

  1. Upload the easy-csv-importer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Easy CSV Importer plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the Settings screen
  4. Always backup your database before mass creating posts
  5. Always backup your database before updating the plugin
sections.faq:
Are custom fields supported?

Yes

Are the new WordPress 3.6 Post Formats supported?

Yes

Can I create custom post types, not just post or page?

Yes

Can I create categories?

Yes

Is there a limit to the number of posts I can create?

No

Does the plugin have free support?

Yes

Is the plugin compatible with ShopperPress?

Yes

Is the plugin compatible with ClassiPress?

Yes

Does this plugin work with SEO by Yoast plugin?

Yes

Is Easy CSV Importer well supported?

Yes

Will development continue for this plugin?

Yes. We hope to be adding new features or making compatability related changes for many years

When was Easy CSV Importer released?

The plugin was released 2010 and re-developed from scratch in 2013
